page.title: 03BAYSTON HILL CARNIVAL
page.content: The summer fair takes place in late June or early July.It is organised by the scout and guide committee.It is opened by a procession of floats with each scout, guide, brownie, cub and play school group dressed up.The procession makes its way to the Glebelands where they are judged.There are a variety of activities and stalls for people to watch and spend their money on:_White elephant, books, cakes, coconuts, goldfish and many more. In the arena is a five a side football competition, tug of war and fancy dress and demonstrations by the keep fit group and the police.There are also side shows. The money raised is to help run the scout and guide hut.
